name: Kuraburo Kai
description: Kuraburo kai has been designed to maximize the brisk and easy feeling of blasting through blocks to your heart's content. In this unique block-breaker, you can charge up your Shuriken to launch piercing throws, or use your Ninjyutu skills to blast through obstacles.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows7 Processor: Core2DUO 2.0G Memory: 256 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 180 MB available space
